name: Color Piano: Music Tiles Game
description:
With our brand new piano game, play your favorite songs in style! Get addicted to high quality music, while enjoy the colorful gameplay and visual. Feel the music as you tap.

HOW TO PLAY:
» Feel the music and catch the dropping piano tiles.
» Easy to play, difficult to master: Accurate melodies require tapping the tiles at the right moment! Prove how fast and accurate can you play!

GAME FEATURES:
» New hits updated weekly! Vote for your favorite songs.
» 1000+ hits of various genres. From Billboard top 100 to Anime soundtracks and Classical pieces - You name it!
» Bright and colorful visual: Want to change theme? Choose from our library. Play in style!
» Multiple players: Challenge your friends or worldwide players to win and claim cool rewards.
» Composer tool: Create your own music and share your masterpieces with the world.
» It's for you: Want to suggest your favorite songs? Vote the songs you wish to play. The winning song will be added afterwards.
» Save your progress via Facebook. Share your achievement and high score to your friends. Play together » The more, the merrier!

Try now for Free! Download Color Piano today!

Please send us your questions or feedback to support@amanotes.com

Find us at:
